title: How to Add Minutes to a Tracfone

steps.title: Add either an Airtime Card or a No Contract Monthly Plan to keep your TracFone Service active.
steps.content: Add either an Airtime Card or a No Contract Monthly Plan to keep your TracFone Service active.

steps.title: Select "Pay As You Go" or "Monthly Value Plans" under the airtime dropdown menu, depending on which option you are looking for.
steps.content: Select "Pay As You Go" or "Monthly Value Plans" under the airtime dropdown menu, depending on which option you are looking for.

steps.title: Add the plan you are looking for and complete the cart check out process.
steps.content: Add the plan you are looking for and complete the cart check out process. You can adjust the quantity as needed should you like to purchase more than one plan at one time. The plans will not be in effect until you activate them, so you can purchase plans in advance should you want them.

steps.title: Purchase additional TracFone minutes at over 90,000 retailers as an option.
steps.content: Purchase additional TracFone minutes at over 90,000 retailers as an option. Popular retailers that carry TracFone cards include: King Soopers, Safeway, Rite Aid, Walgreens, Kroger, Family Dollar, Food Lion and more. Find a TracFone retailer near you using the TracFone store finder at:

steps.title: Add more airtime over the phone 1-800-867-7183.
steps.content: Add more airtime over the phone 1-800-867-7183. When adding airtime over the phone, make sure you have a credit card or other acceptable method of payment at hand.
